author: Video Advice
description:
On February 19, 2025, the CEO of Microsoft tweeted: “Most of us grew up learning there are three main types of matter: solid, liquid, and gas. Today, that changed. We've created the fourth state of matter."

👉🏼 Below is an excerpt used from a Glenn Beck video that relates to our discussion. Check it out to gain more insights into the topic: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HC0zozeP8DY
